title: Why I Build Tools
excerpt: Tools are not the work. They are how thinking stops being theoretical.

title: Ownership After the Win
excerpt: A win without ownership is temporary. Someone has to keep the lighthouse on.

title: AI: Tasks vs Judgment
excerpt: Speed is easy to measure. Judgment is harder, and that is where outcomes live.

title: Choice Paralysis
excerpt: Waiting for a list is the new quiet failure.
